#summary Roadmap and Directions
= Roadmap and Directions =
== First release 0.0.1 ==
 * Simple and first stack based VM interpreter.
 * Core libraries, Regexp, Port, CGI, traditional macro and continuation.
== by version 0.1.0 ==
 * [R6RS] compliant
 * Support major SRFIs.
== by version 0.2.0 ==
 * Support socket.
== by version 0.3.0 ==
 * Support basic threads.
== by version 0.4.0 ==
 * Useful multi-thread libraries
== by version 0.5.0 ==
 * Debugging features.

...

== by version 1.0 ==
 * Stabilize
